title: ILocalSketchPatternFeatureData.SelectedPoint
description: Gets or sets the selected point for this sketch-driven component pattern feature.
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ILocalSketchPatternFeatureData::ReferencePoint
is set to
swLocalSketchPatternReferencePoint_e
.swLocalSketchPatternSelectedPoint.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this property.
